meanings.definition: The superlative form of the adjective 'good'.
meanings.sent1: My sister always tries her best in school.
meanings.sent2: She won the award for being the best student in the class.
meanings.sent3: The best cake at the party was gone in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness shines like the best star in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The best way to learn is through practice and dedication.

meanings.definition: The third person singular form of the verb 'to eat'.
meanings.sent1: He eats his breakfast every morning.
meanings.sent2: She eats her vegetables without any complaints.
meanings.sent3: The cat eats its food with great enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: Time eats away at the memories we hold dear.
meanings.sent5: The fire eagerly eats through the dry wood.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the noun 'est'.
meanings.sent1: The three ests in the room were all different colors.
meanings.sent2: She collected all the ests she found on the beach.
meanings.sent3: The ests on the shelf looked like a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: The ests in the nest chirped happily in the morning.
meanings.sent5: The ests in the garden added a pop of color to the landscape.
